availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel A. Criswell (Greenup County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of John Criswell and Sarah Hunt Criswell. Resident of Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. District 2, p. 169. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 110. KYR-0001-029-0583.
